column3: Do nothing. Can't be discarded by another card or token.
Add +1 dexterity when escaping from dog
Add +1 dexterity when escaping from a hunter
If another animal steals from you, pay 5 coins instead of getting your harvest stolen
When exchanging fatigue tokens for 1 weak card, pay +1 fatigue tokens. Discard 2 cards
Move hunter 1 position. Pay 1 courage token.
